detailsOfAchievement: UNITY MALANCHA, a DRAMA TROUPE OF Halisahar, 24 Parganas(North) 42 Kms away from the Capital City of Kolkata, have been able to achieve the slevel of Proficiency and skill in performing stage plays for the last two decades. It have thirty bonafide members among which 15 artists including Director, actors and technician attend rehearshal and stage shows on regular basis. Unity Malancha generally perform 20 to 22 shows per month (excepting the months of rainy season) and the artists move from one place to another all over India throughout the year. In this way the group rear up India culture and creativity and also try to step up the language of Bengali Culture. The artists of this group, not only involve themselves as participants, but also they take active parts in spreading art and culture among common people. They are also favoured by the group with remuneration for their work of art and culture. This financial assistance encourage impetus among them and is also helpful to their respective families. At the outset, members of Unity Malancha were loudy with only stage shows of plays. But from the 5th or 6th year, the members begal to organize seminars, drama-festivals, street plays, plays by children etc. by which activities of the group increased dayby day. One more remarkable programme was also organized by the group i.e. celebration of birty centenary, birth bi-centenary of great personalities or art and culture. At present Unity Malancha have chalked out a year-long programme of plays, seminars childrenâ€™s playsand celebration. At least four to five days in each month the group will arrange these programme in different towns and cities and also in Kolkata to arouse enthusiasm and Zeal for art and culture among the artists. Moreover Unity Malancha will organize Theatre-training, Workshop of direction, acting, writing and technicalities of theatre. This year long programme will engage a considerable number of people artists and personalities of theatre. Unity Malancha had been trying to find out novelty, subtle creativity and snew languages of theatre by its continuous process of performing art.

title: USHNEEK
detailsOfAchievement: USHNEEK was formed in 1984 with a group of young enthusiastic theater lovers and was registered in the year 1991-92. In this long journey USHNEEK has produced 10 full act plays, five one act plays, organized theater workshops and took part in various theater related activities. Among the full act plays- KAMAL KAMINI, received A.I.C.C award, PRAMATHESH BARUA award, UTTAM KUMAR award and many more. Late Srimati Ketaki Datta received NATTYA ACADEMI award for her performance in KAMAL KAMINI. Our previous production, GAWAHARJAAN has also received much public attention and won accolades like All India Critics Award, UTTAM KUMAR Award and PRAMATHESH BARUA AWARD. USHNEEK has participated in almost major theater festivals like NANDIKAR NATTYOSOB, NATTYA ACADEMI FESTIVAL, YUVA UTHKAL INTERNATIONAL FESTIVAL. These are only to name of few. USHNEEK has workshops for mentally challenged children for two NGOs. We have also produced a workshop based production- RAAT PARIDER RUPKATHA with both male and female sex workers of kolkata. In short from its birth USHNEEK is regularly involved in different theatrical activities like organizing workshops, seminars, play reading sessions and arranging lectures by eminent theater personalities.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Provided educational services to the poor students.In this year this organization worked by its own contribution.
Apart from the previous programs, in this year this organisation conducted a community development project which was related to drinking water. We have done all the programs from our own contribution

We have observed that among the people of rural areas, Hygiene care especially for the ladies, sanitization, child marriage, no birth control, drug addiction, child labor etc are the burning issues. We have tried to aware people by door to door campaign in several interior areas. Apart from regular studies to spread Computer knowledge to the poor students, we have distributed Computer books among the students . In this year this organization worked by its own contribution.

Apart from the previous program, in this year we worked for the children from the backward classes of the villages. To fulfill our motto we have conducted an overall survey among the school going backward classes students in several village areas, one by one. We have contributed of our own to continue with the aforesaid programs.

In this year to fulfill our target we have started a free proposed CBSE School for the underprivileged children at Block: Kharibari, Dist: Darjeeling. Name of our School is Minoti Devi Memorial English Medium School. Presently we have started our preprimary section (LKG) and searching for CSR or Govt. funds, to upgrade it. In Skill Development training sector, we have started Hotel Management training. We have done all these programs form our own.

Presently entire world is suffering from Covid 19 pandemic. During to lockdown almost all the people were bound to stay at home. So many people are still jobless. As a social worker we have tried our level best to stay by the side in times of grief. We have collected some donation and distributed some food, medicine, tripol, cloths etc to the poor people.
